Summary: Silent craft moving stealthily across the sky above the neighborhood
divs: sighting detailsi was outside at around 2:30am sunday morning, sitting in a chair on my lawn, my neck was craned to peer out of my skull at the dazzingly array of stars in the night sky. i make a habit out of watching the skies above my house and learning the movements of the deep cosmos at we revolve through time on this weird planet. i was sitting back with sherlock, my tobacco pipe in my hand and i noticed slick movement against the relatively motionless backdrop. i thought it may be a comet, falling\shooting star, or whatever flashes across the skies at night, but it kept moving towards the house. i was semi-stunned because it was not normal and all i could do was point at the rectangular red lights on the bottom of what appeared to be a super stealthy rectangular tube floating silently across my neighborhood and house. the craft was not far from the ground and made absolutley no sound. it appeared to be a surviellance craft, man-made and deathly silent.
